page.title: 08Appleby Primary School
page.content: There are about two hundred and fifty children.Our headmaster is Mr Clarkson and we have eleven teachers. We are taught Maths,English,Music,R.E. Science,History,Geography and Physical Education.We are lucky to have a sport's field that we do athletics and play football on and we have swimming lessons and gala at Appleby pool. At school there are a lot of clubs and outings you can go to.There is a gym club,recorder club and violin club.In the fourth year which is the oldest year there is an outing to Lakeside for a weekend and there have been conoeing and sailing weekends and lessons on Tuesday and Thursday nights.We have events to raise money for Save the Children Fund.You can start school at four and leave at eleven. Ian Atkinson
